## Workspace.newComment() method

Obtain a newly created comment.

**Signature:**

```typescript
newComment(id?: string): WorkspaceComment;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | _(Optional)_ Optional ID. Use this ID if provided, otherwise create a new ID. |

**Returns:**

[WorkspaceComment](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.md)

The created comment.
